item.title: CVE-2024-34793|2024-06-03T10:52:01.570Z -- Kharim Tomlinson -- WP Next Post Navi
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kharim Tomlinson WP Next Post Navi allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Next Post Navi: from n/a through 1.8.3.
